articles.title: Google's AI chatbot Bard gets smarter, now answers questions about YouTube videos - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Google is expanding Bard's YouTube Extension to understand some video content on the platform and answer specific queries on them.
articles.content:
Google has said that its artificial intelligence (AI) chatbot Bard can now understand YouTube videos and answer specific questions regarding the content of some of these videos.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy F14 receives a price cut in India - Times of India
articles.description: Samsung has reduced the price of its Galaxy F14 5G smartphone in India by up to Rs 1,000. The phone, which comes in two variants, now costs Rs 13,990
